question: Who is the author of ‘Hemant Karkare: A Daughters Memoir’?
explanation: On November 25,2019 Jui Navare, daughter of martyr Hemant Karkare, released her book named A Daughter’s Memoir. The book that was launched at Prerna Hall of Police Club, is published by Crossword. He was a positive role model, an inspiration. After reading the book, you will receive the courage to never give up in life and know what a great man he was.
